abstract: DealBook Online; Massachusetts securities regulator accuses Fidelity Investments of allowing unregistered investment advisers to make trades in Fidelity customer accounts over past decade, generating fees.
lead_paragraph: The secretary of the commonwealth said that Fidelity Brokerage Service had acted as a “haven from regulatory oversight” for unregistered advisers.

headline.main: Massachusetts Accuses Fidelity of Failing to Block Unregistered Advisers

snippet: The secretary of the commonwealth said that Fidelity Brokerage Service had acted as a “haven from regulatory oversight” for unregistered advisers.
